jobs.basic_qualifications:
- 1+ years of analyzing and interpreting data with Redshift, Oracle, NoSQL etc. experience
- Experience with data visualization using Tableau, Quicksight, or similar tools
- Experience with one or more industry analytics visualization tools (e.g. Excel, Tableau, QuickSight, MicroStrategy, PowerBI) and statistical methods (e.g. t-test, Chi-squared)
- Experience with scripting language (e.g., Python, Java, or R)
jobs.description:
Amazon has the world’s most complex supply chain: we fulfill global demand for hundreds of millions of products at lightning fast delivery speeds. We need your skills to optimize our supply chain, with the end goal of delighting our customers. A core part of the supply chain operations is Demand and Inbound Forecasting: We forecast the demand and arrival of tens of millions of products. The forecasts are used to make many decisions, such as automatically order hundreds of millions worth of inventory, decide where to place that inventory, and establish labor plans for WW warehouses.

We are looking for a Business Intelligence Engineer to develop new tools and metrics to oversee the delivery of analytics solutions across the product development lifecycle, from entitlement through implementation and ongoing business operations.

A successful candidate will be customer obsessed - the Forecasting org has 50+ unique customers. You will need to balance technical execution with customer needs. You will be comfortable navigating an dynamic environment, know how to confirm and reconfirm assumptions, and be able to communicate your point of view.
jobs.description_short: Amazon has the world’s most complex supply chain: we fulfill global demand for hundreds of millions of products at lightning fast delivery speeds. We need your skills to optimize our supply chain, with
jobs.preferred_qualifications:
- Master's degree, or Advanced technical degree
- Knowledge of data modeling and data pipeline design
- Experience with statistical analysis, co-relation analysis

jobs.title: Business Intelligence Engineer, Forecasting & Labs Analytics

jobs.basic_qualifications:
- 3+ years of analyzing and interpreting data with Redshift, Oracle, NoSQL etc. experience
- Experience with data modeling, warehousing and building ETL pipelines
- Experience with data visualization using Tableau, Quicksight, or similar tools
- Experience writing complex SQL queries
- Experience in Statistical Analysis packages such as R, SAS and Matlab
- Experience using SQL to pull data from a database or data warehouse and scripting experience (Python) to process data for modeling
jobs.description:
The Supply Chain Optimization Technologies (SCOT) organization, has an immediate need for a creative business intelligence engineer (BIE) with a
passion for building systems that have a measurable impact. The right candidate will be innovative and
technically versatile. You will have the opportunity to work with one of the largest and most complex
warehouses in the world to gather insights using from across Amazon.

As a BIE, you should be an expert in the architecture of data warehouse solutions for the enterprise
using multiple platforms. You should excel in the design, creation, management, and business use of
extremely large datasets. Excellent business and communication skills are required to work with
business analysts and data engineers to understand how best to design reporting and analytics data
systems.

Key job responsibilities
Apply mining, quantitative analysis, and statistical models to understand how our customers interact
with us and identify ways to improve the customer experience and meet our goals
• Build scalable solutions and self-serve platforms that will provide insights to inform business decision
making
• Optimizing the performance of business-critical queries and dealing with ETL job-related issues
• Gathering and understanding data requirements, working with the team to achieve high quality data
ingestion and building systems that can process, transform, and store the data in various relational and non-relational stores
• Dive deeply into technical details (e.g., key dependencies, design choices, operability, etc.) with
engineering teams and drive constructive technical discussions. Extracting and combining data from
various heterogeneous data sources
• Build and evaluate end-to-end designs for strengths and weaknesses (quality, scalability, latency,
security, performance, data integrity, etc.)
• Create interactive visual dashboards with Tableau and QuickSight
• Write clear documentation, architecture documents and create an engineering roadmap
• Exploring and learning the latest AWS technologies to provide new capabilities and increase efficiency.
Members of this team will be challenged to innovate use the latest big data techniques. We are looking
for people who are motivated by thinking big, moving fast, and exploring business insights. If you love to implement solutions to complex problems while working hard, having fun, and making history, this may be the opportunity for you

A day in the life
Amazon offers a full range of benefits that support you and eligible family members, including domestic partners and their children. Benefits can vary by location, the number of regularly scheduled hours you work, length of employment, and job status such as seasonal or temporary employment. The benefits that generally apply to regular, full-time employees include:
1. Medical, Dental, and Vision Coverage
2. Maternity and Parental Leave Options
3. Paid Time Off (PTO)
4. RRSP
jobs.description_short: The Supply Chain Optimization Technologies (SCOT) organization, has an immediate need for a creative business intelligence engineer (BIE) with apassion for building systems that have a measurable impact.
jobs.preferred_qualifications:
- Experience with AWS solutions such as EC2, DynamoDB, S3, and Redshift
- Experience in data mining, ETL, etc. and using databases in a business environment with large-scale, complex datasets

jobs.title: Business Intelligence Engineer, Forecasting & Labs Analytics

jobs.basic_qualifications:
- - Master's or PHD degree in Engineering (or equivalent)
- - 5+ years experience working cross-functionally with tech and non-tech teams, including operations in large corporations
- - 5+ years experience working in Europe
- - 3+ years experience of leading programs visible to Sr. Leadership
jobs.description:
EU AMZL Sustainability Engineering is looking for a talented Sr Electrical Engineer to scale programs within the wider AMZL electrification transformation.

Amazon is committed to building a sustainable future for our customers, local communities, and the planet. Under The Climate Pledge we committed to be net-zero carbon across our business by 2040, 10 years ahead of the Paris Agreement. To get there, we need exceptionally talented, bright, and driven people that are dedicated to making a meaningful impact on the sustainability of our products and supply chain.

Core initiative are the electrification of last mile and middle mile fleet and the implementation of technologies to maximize energy efficiency of our buildings. This requires the creation of one of the largest private charging networks in the world and the definition of innovative electrical design to enable smart grids processes.

Key job responsibilities
Align and set stakeholders’ expectations for the installation of AMZL EV charging infrastructure and/or smart grid. This requires multiple weekly interaction with EU Electrification program management, Global Fleet Product team, Reliability Maintenance Engineering (RME), Global Procurement, Finance and OPS teams, as well as with our external partners.
Develop and manage vendors, in order to ensure installation capacity, quality of commissioning and smooth interaction on-site with other teams like health and safety and operations.
Build high-level expertise in electrical engineering technologies and related implementation processes.
Perform design validation in order to ensure that various teams are respecting electrical standards during installation of electrical equipment.
Act as subject matter expert and support Field Engineering to prepare for the execution of installation on-site.
Ensure the respect of mechanisms for cost controlling. Proactively improve those mechanisms with equal focus on reliability of installation and financial performances.
Write business cases and present them to leadership to scope programs.

A day in the life
Your day could include engagement with all levels of the organization and multiple stakeholder groups to drive short, mid and long term decisions that have impact on a large scale across the AMZL network. You would also be working with partners from Operations, Process Improvement, Health and Safety, Ergonomics, Finance, Procurement and external vendors to design and deploy new equipment and processes for the multiple process paths in AMZL Delivery Stations. You will find a cooperative environment with a common commitment on making Amazon business a worldwide reference for Sustainability actions.

About the team
EU AMZL Sustainability Engineering is responsible for the definition and continuous improvement of electrical standards for EV charging network and smart grid solutions. We ensure reliability of design and we obsess over costs since we believe that waste of resources is one of the major risks for Sustainability actions. The scale of Amazon last mile network requires the team to establish close partnership with other teams: we get plans and financial justification from Global Fleet team or from EU Sustainability team; we leverage footprint and skills of Field Engineering team for installation; we get continuous feedback from Maintenance and Operation teams to improve our products.

jobs.basic_qualifications:
- 4年制大学での学士号または同等の経験
- 7年以上のデジタル広告営業または関連分野での実務経験
- 複雑な顧客関係を独立して管理し、長期的な戦略を設計・実行した実績
- マス（50社程度）営業の経験
- 広告主、媒体社、広告代理店、コンサルティング会社での実務経験
- E-commerceまたはdigital adsに関わった実務経験
- データ作成や解釈、データを活用したビジネスの経験
- 優れたコミュニケーションスキルと交渉スキル、ソリューション営業の経験
- ネイティブレベルの日本語力
- ビジネスレベルの英語力
- Office 365, Salesforceおよび類似するオンラインツールを使用した実務経験
- Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience
- 7+ years of working experience in digital advertising sales or related fields
- Proven track record of independently managing complex customer relationships and designing/executing long-term strategies
- Experience in mass sales (around 50 companies)
- Working experience in advertiser, publisher, advertising agency, or consulting company
- Working experience related to E-commerce or digital Ads
- Experience creating and interpreting data, and making business recommendations
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills, solution selling experience
- Native level Japanese proficiency
- Business-level English communication skills
- Experience using online productivity tools such as Office 365, Salesforce, or similar software
jobs.description:
English follows Japanese

Amazon Advertisingは、顧客が購入したいものを見つけて発見できるようにすることを目的として、豊富なデジタル広告ソリューションを提供しています。私たちは、Amazon自社サイト、Amazon以外のサイト、PC、モバイル、タブレットなどを閲覧しているAmazonユーザーに広告主がリーチする手助けをしています。
我々のチーム(Amazon Advertising)は急速に拡大し世界に通じる広告ビジネスを、常に顧客を中心にフォーカスし提供しています。このような組織で一緒に働きませんか?
シニア広告営業として、顧客ニーズや販売戦略が明確でない複雑な状況下で、独自に長期的なソリューションを設計・実行していただきます。中小の既存広告主から新規広告主まで、Sponsored Products(検索連動型広告)、Sponsored Brands(ブランディング広告)、Sponsored Display(ディスプレイ広告)、DSP(プログラマティック広告)、プライムビデオAds等のディスプレイ広告を含むフルファネルソリューションを活用し、広告主のビジネス全体の成長を支援します。
グローバルのチームメイトとの協業や商品チーム、小売りチームとの協業、戦略的プロジェクトチームのリード。成長している組織の中であなたのキャリアを発揮できるチャンスがあります。

Amazon Advertising offers rich digital advertising solutions with the goal of helping customers find and discover anything they want to buy. We help advertisers reach Amazon customers on Amazon-owned and operated sites, other high-quality digital properties, and across PCs, mobile devices, and tablets.
Our team (Amazon Advertising) is rapidly expanding our world-class advertising business with a relentless focus on the customer. Would you like to join such an organization?
As a Senior Account Executive, you will independently design and execute long-term solutions in complex situations where customer needs and sales strategies are not clearly defined. You will support the overall business growth of small to medium-sized advertisers, both existing and new, by leveraging full-funnel solutions including Sponsored Products (search advertising), Sponsored Brands (brand awareness), Sponsored Display (display advertising), DSP (programmatic advertising), and Prime Video Ads.
Through collaboration with global teammates, product teams, retail teams, and leading strategic project teams, you will have the opportunity to advance your career in a growing organization.




Key job responsibilities
主な業務責任、役割:
• 複雑な顧客関係やイニシアチブを、マネージャーのサポートなしで独立して管理し、顧客ニーズや販売戦略が未定義の状況下で長期的なソリューションを設計・実行します。
• 特定業界や広告ソリューションにおける深い専門知識を活用し、戦略的パートナーとして機能し、カテゴリーレベルのインサイトを提供します。
• データドリブンなインサイトと業界知識を活用し、広告主のビジネス全体の成長を支援する構造化された長期計画を策定・実行します。
• 検索連動型広告(SP)、ブランディング広告(SB)、ディスプレイ広告(SD)、DSP、プライムビデオAdsを含むフルファネルソリューションの最適な組み合わせを提案します。
• 既存イニシアチブへの貢献またはリード、新しい戦略的イニシアチブの必要性を特定しリードします。
• ベストプラクティスを開発し、組織全体への共有を推進し、プロセスの改善、効率化、簡素化を主導します。
• 非標準的または複雑なエスカレーションに対応し、関係を損なうことなく解決策を導出します。
• 組織内およびロケーション内でのメンバーの積極的なメンタリングと、採用活動への参加と新メンバーの育成支援を行います。

Key Job Responsibilities:
• Independently manage complex customer relationships and initiatives with minimal manager support, designing and executing long-term solutions in situations where customer needs and sales strategies are undefined.
• Leverage deep expertise in specific industries or advertising solutions to act as a strategic partner, providing category-level insights.
• Develop and execute structured, long-term plans that drive overall business growth for advertisers using data-driven insights and industry expertise.
• Recommend optimal combinations of full-funnel solutions including SP, SB, SD, DSP, and Prime Video Ads.
• Contribute to or lead established initiatives; identify and lead new strategic initiatives.
• Develop and share best practices across the organization; drive process improvements, streamlining, and simplification.
• Address non-standard or complex escalations while maintaining relationships.
• Actively mentor team members within the organization and location; participate in recruiting activities and support the development of new team members.


About the team
GGSはグローバルな組織で、担当するのは成長過程にある中小規模の広告主です。Amazon Adsでの取引が一定額以上ある広告主様から、広告の活用余地が大きい広告主様等、取引額や関係性も異なる中、商談や電話、メールやウェビナーなど適切な手段を用いて、営業活動を行っているのが特徴です。次々と行われる新規機能の追加や改善などをスピード感を持ってキャッチアップし、広告主の課題に合った使い方や組み合わせの提案、およびパフォーマンスデータに基づいたコンサルティングや最適化のためのサポートを行っているチームです。

GGS is a global organization that manages small to medium-sized advertisers in their growth phase. We work with a diverse range of advertisers—from those with a certain level of Amazon Ads spending to those with significant advertising potential—varying in transaction volume and relationship depth. Our team is characterized by conducting sales activities through appropriate channels such as meetings, phone calls, emails, and webinars. We quickly catch up with the continuous rollout of new features and improvements, proposing usage methods and combinations tailored to advertisers' challenges, and providing consulting and optimization support based on performance data.

・Department：Global Growth Sales (JP/EN)
・Job：Sales&Account Manager (JP/EN)
・Internal Collaboration to Maximize Individual Strengths (JP/EN)

- Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams

- Strong presentation skills and ability to create strategic documents for senior leaders
- Experience leading strategic initiatives
- Experience developing and sharing best practices across the organization
- Experience in mentoring and people development
- Strong ownership, autonomy, and bias for action
- Demonstrated ability to perform well in a highly dynamic, rapidly changing environment
- High motivation for achieving targets and delivering reliable results
- Deep knowledge of internet advertising industry and internet advertising products
- Passion for absorbing new knowledge and developing new business/opportunities

jobs.title: Senior Account Executive, Global Growth Sales, Amazon Ads

jobs.basic_qualifications:
- 5+ years of developing, negotiating and executing business agreements experience
- Bachelor's degree
- Experience developing strategies that influence leadership decisions at the organizational level
- Experience managing programs across cross functional teams, building processes and coordinating release schedules
- Experience influencing internal and external stakeholders
jobs.description:
Amazon Ads helps brands create experiences that delight customers and deliver meaningful results. With 300+ million worldwide active customers, and first-party insights based on shopping, streaming and browsing signals, brands can craft innovative campaigns that help customers find and discover anything they want. Our solutions on Amazon.com, services like Twitch, Freevee, Alexa, Amazon Music, and partnerships with third-party publishers and exchanges make Amazon Ads the ultimate amplifier for brands to reach the right audiences in the right places, both on and off Amazon. Amazon Advertising is a key strategic focus for Amazon and is in a rapid and exciting growth phase.
We start with the customer and work backwards in everything we do, including advertising. If you’re interested in joining an innovative team working to build a unique, world-class advertising business with a relentless focus on the customer, you’ve come to the right place.
Amazon Ads Partners help brands achieve and exceed their desired outcomes through tech innovation and expert managed services. In order to accelerate the next phase of Amazon Ads development, we are committed to transforming the depth, scale and ambition of our partnerships with a diverse landscape of partners across a full range of independent agencies, as well as AdTech and MarTech SaaS providers. Our team builds partnerships across the advertising landscape to drive innovation and growth for all brands, including those that do not sell on Amazon.com.
As Ads partners work across all ad products, supply sources and geographies, this is an exciting opportunity to drive impact widely across the business.

The right person will manage the relationship with existing partners and new business from end-to-end, including understanding market dynamics, evaluating new partnership opportunities, conducting partner outreach, negotiating term sheets and agreements and driving to execution. You are a role model for best practices for incubating new partnerships, diving deep into partners’ tech products, and improving partner performance. Your success will require close collaboration with internal cross-functional teams including Product and Tech on new product innovation designed to help brands unlock better outcomes. You demonstrate the ability to think strategically about issues, identify trends and effectively influence internal stakeholders such as Finance and Legal by earning trust and being right a lot.

【日本語】
Amazon Adsは、ブランドが顧客を喜ばせ、意義ある結果をもたらす体験を創造するのを支援します。世界中に3億人以上のアクティブな顧客を持ち、ショッピング、ストリーミング、閲覧シグナルに基づく一次情報を活用することで、ブランドは顧客があらゆるものを見つけ、発見するのを助ける革新的なキャンペーンを作り出すことができます。Amazon.comでのソリューション、Twitch、Freevee、Alexa、Amazon Musicなどのサービス、そしてサードパーティのパブリッシャーや取引所とのパートナーシップにより、Amazon Adsは、Amazonの内外で適切な場所で適切な視聴者にリーチするためのブランドの究極のアンプリファイアーとなります。Amazon Adsは、Amazonの重要な戦略的焦点であり、急速かつエキサイティングな成長段階にあります。

私たちは広告を含むあらゆる面で、顧客を起点に考え、そこから逆算して取り組んでいます。顧客を徹底的に重視しながら、ユニークかつグローバルの広告ビジネスを構築する革新的なチームに参加することに興味があれば、このポジションはとても適したものです。

Amazon Adsのパートナーは、技術革新と専門的な管理サービスを通じて、ブランドが望む成果を達成し、それを超えるのを支援します。Amazon Adsにおける開発の次のフェーズを加速させるために、私たちは独立系広告代理店、AdTechおよびMarTech SaaSプロバイダーを含む多様なパートナーとの提携に取り組んでいます。私たちのチームは、広告業界全体にわたってパートナーシップを構築し、Amazon.comで販売していないブランドを含む全てのブランドのイノベーションと成長を促進します。

広告パートナーは全ての広告製品、供給源、地域にわたって活動するため、これはビジネス全体に広く影響を与える刺激的な機会です。

適任者は、市場の理解、新しいパートナーシップ機会の評価、パートナーへのアウトリーチ、契約条件の交渉、契約の締結、実行への推進を含む、既存のパートナーとの関係と新規ビジネスをエンドツーエンドで管理します。あなたは、新しいパートナーシップの育成、パートナーの技術製品への深い理解、パートナーのパフォーマンス向上のためのベストプラクティスのロールモデルです。あなたの成功には、ブランドがより良い成果を引き出すのを助けることを目的に作られた広告におけるイノベーションに関して、プロダクト部門やテック部門を含む社内の機能横断チームとの密接な協力が必要です。あなたは、課題に対して戦略的に考え、トレンドを特定し、信頼を獲得し、正しい判断をすることで、財務や法務などの社内のステークホルダーを効果的に影響を与えることを求められています。

Key job responsibilities
- Close high impact partnerships driving revenue, product adoption and strategic outcomes for Amazon Ads
- Manage a portfolio of Amazon Ads partners, influencing their tech and GTM strategy
- Ability to represent Amazon to C-Suite leaders at partner companies
- Deep on technical business models and product integrations
- Work cross-functionally across product, tech, sales, legal and finance to drive initiatives and programs
- Drive innovation to address opportunities for enhanced partner growth at scale
- Own robust goals for revenue, product adoption and strategic actions
- Lead with an analytical approach to business development, leveraging data to drive decisions

【日本語】
- Amazon Adsにおいて収益、製品採用、戦略的成果を推進する高影響力のパートナーシップを締結する
- Amazon Adsパートナーのポートフォリオを管理し、彼らの技術と市場投入戦略に影響を与える
- パートナー企業のCxOに対するコミュニケーション能力
- 技術的なビジネスモデルと製品統合に関する深い知識
- イニシアチブとプログラムを推進するために、製品、技術、営業、法務、財務部門と機能横断的に協力する
- パートナーの成長を大規模に強化する機会に対応するイノベーションを推進する
- 収益、製品採用、戦略的行動に関する堅固な目標達成のために推進する
- データを活用して意思決定を行う、分析的アプローチでビジネス開発をリードする

About the team
Amazon Ads Partners help brands achieve and exceed their desired outcomes through tech innovation and expert managed services. In order to accelerate the next phase of Amazon Ads development, we are committed to transforming the depth, scale and ambition of our partnerships with a diverse landscape of partners across a full range of independent agencies, as well as AdTech and MarTech SaaS providers. Our team builds partnerships across the advertising landscape to drive innovation and growth for all brands, including those that do not sell on Amazon.com.

Amazon Adsのパートナーは、技術革新と専門的な管理サービスを通じて、ブランドが望む成果を達成し、それを超えるのを支援します。Amazon Adsにおける開発の次のフェーズを加速させるために、私たちは独立系広告代理店、AdTechおよびMarTech SaaSプロバイダーを含む多様なパートナーとの提携に取り組んでいます。私たちのチームは、広告業界全体にわたってパートナーシップを構築し、Amazon.comで販売していないブランドを含む全てのブランドのイノベーションと成長を促進します。

jobs.basic_qualifications:
- 8+ years of technical product or program management experience
- 2+ years of end to end product delivery experience
- Bachelor's degree
- Experience owning/driving roadmap strategy and definition
- Experience with feature delivery and tradeoffs of a product
- Experience technical product management
jobs.description:
Join Amazon Shipping team to shape the future of shipping as a part of a new, emerging business and solve the biggest customer pain points in the small parcel logistics industry globally.

It’s no secret that Amazon relies on its technology to deliver millions of packages every day to its customers – on time, with low cost. We, the Product and Technology organization, simplify complex software solutions that work across our shippers, vendors, and warehouses to optimize both time & cost of getting the packages delivered. Our services already handle thousands of requests per second, make business decisions impacting billions of dollars a year, integrate with a network of small and large shippers, operators and drivers worldwide, manage business rules for millions of unique products, and improve the ordering and delivery experience for millions of online shoppers. That said, this remains a fast-growing business and our technical journey has only started. Our mission is to build the most efficient and optimal shipping solution on the planet, using our technology and engineering muscle as our biggest advantage. We aim to leverage top technologies in big data and optimization techniques to operate high volume, low latency, and high availability services.

What will you do?
As a Principal Product Manager, you will lead new, large product initiatives to define the long-term strategy and vision to meet emerging customer needs. You will handle complex product development and business management scenarios, proactively identifying gaps/opportunities to then develop a suite of products to solve the problems.

The ideal candidate has a strong logistics/supply chain and product management background combined with a solid understanding of current technologies. S/he can develop and drive high-level strategic initiatives but also roll up their sleeves, dig in and get the job done. Maturity, strong business judgment, ability to influence cross-functional and remote teams, a customer-centric and creative mindset with strong analytical skills are essential. This opportunity requires excellent product management, prioritization, and communication skills, as well as the ability to navigate ambiguity.

Key job responsibilities
- Define a data-driven product vision, detailed requirements, and prioritize competing opportunities.
- Work directly with stakeholders and engineering to build exceptional products.
- Partner with other teams across Amazon Shipping Product and Tech to identify and influence development of new products and services.
- Understand customer (external and internal) needs, define clear project plans and execute to high expectations in a fast-paced environment.
- Interact with stakeholders at multiple levels and in multiple locations, working with business, operations, tech and BI teams to define and deliver solutions.
- Anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management, and make tradeoffs to balance business needs versus technical or operational constraints.
- Collaborate with global stakeholders in other regions to define requirements that support international use cases.
- Define user stories and product requirements; while contributing to the technical design of new product features.
- About 10% travel required.

A day in the life
- Start your morning analyzing overnight pickup performance and routing efficiency metrics – identifying patterns like why shippers had delayed pickups or where routes are running inefficiently
- Build and refine models that optimize forecasting and routing decisions in real-time – determining which driver, vehicle, and route minimizes costs while maintaining pickup reliability when shippers schedule pickups
- Collaborate with operations teams across US, UK, and EU markets – translating real-world routing challenges (like unnecessary box truck dispatches) into algorithm improvements
- Drive strategic cost reduction initiatives – working to cut first-mile costs per package and reduce inefficient "infinity routes" through smarter capacity planning
- Develop predictive systems that prevent operational failures – building tools to predict zero-volume days, create same-day pickup recovery options, and reduce missed pickups
- Balance technical depth with business impact – moving between writing routing algorithms, presenting cost savings to leadership, and debugging specific route optimization issues across markets

jobs.description:
Amazon Leo is Amazon’s low Earth orbit satellite network. Our mission is to deliver fast, reliable internet connectivity to customers beyond the reach of existing networks. From individual households to schools, hospitals, businesses, and government agencies, Amazon Leo will serve people and organizations operating in locations without reliable connectivity.

We are seeking a talented Software Development Engineer to join Amazon Leo team, working on our ambitious satellite internet constellation that will provide fast, affordable broadband to unserved and underserved communities around the world. This role requires a strong foundation in production software development, database architecture, and machine learning technologies.

Key job responsibilities
- Participate in the full life-cycle of development of SW- including concept, design, architecture, development, unit/subsystem/integrated test, deployment and maintenance.
- Work closely with hardware and systems engineers to support board-bring up, manufacturing, integration, debug/test, and design.
- Develop and maintain automated test frameworks and tools to validate manufacturing processes and ensure product quality standards
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot production issues and implement corrective actions in real-time manufacturing environments
- Create and maintain technical documentation including software specifications, test procedures, and manufacturing process guidelines
- Support continuous integration and deployment pipelines for manufacturing software releases across multiple production facilities
- Develop diagnostic tools and utilities to facilitate rapid troubleshooting and reduce downtime in manufacturing operations

Export Control Requirement:
Due to applicable export control laws and regulations, candidates must be a U.S. citizen or national, U.S. permanent resident (i.e., current Green Card holder), or lawfully admitted into the U.S. as a refugee or granted asylum.

jobs.basic_qualifications:

- Have an online portfolio or samples of work on resume, demonstrating experience creating great end-to-end, user-centered design solutions and patterns, across desktop and mobile devices
- Knowledge of and proficiency in a variety of design tools such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Fireworks, and InDesign
- Knowledge of typography, design principles, trends and best practices across digital and print
- Experience managing multiple projects and priorities across teams in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment
- Experience communicating clearly and concisely with leadership, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams

- 6+ years’ experience as a visual designer in a creative agency or similar creative production environment.
- Proactive self-starter, who is a customer-obsessed, detail-oriented, and enthusiastic team player.
jobs.description:
Amazon Advertising Services is looking for a talented and passionate Sr. Visual Designer to join the Creative Services team based in Bangalore, India. At Amazon we always put the customer first, you need to have demonstrated success in translating business goals to an inspiring creative direction. You will start with the customer in your rationale, understanding that what you do is critical to creating a successful, consistent shopping experience.  Your primary focus will be to design complex visually compelling and effective advertising creatives for internal and external stakeholders.

Sr. Visual Designer is responsible of the design process of medium, high-visibility, and complex design executions including (reference provided, and high-complexity creative conceptualization). They have strong knowledge in the digital design domain, and have a strong understanding of how design principles work together (typography, composition, scale, color theory, etc.). They are subject matter experts in a business area of focus. They manage their own design queue, are able to deal with ambiguity, and are learning to be strategic by proposing alternative solutions when the traditional approach does not solve the needs of the business. They own medium-complexity projects and work with limited-guidance. They are starting to mentor and they share their knowledge with the team. They follow Art Directors design guidance and feedback when working on high complexity executions for their level, they work across and influence partner teams across multiple disciplines which includes roles such as marketing, creative campaign managers, business leads, visual designers, new design hires and program or product management. They contribute to team goals and program metrics, understanding the impact, and the impact of their tactics, on the customer experience. They provide tactical and strategic recommendations that streamline existing creative processes.

Key job responsibilities

• Responsible of their own design queue and the design process of medium, high-visibility, and complex design executions (Reference provided, and high-complexity creative conceptualization assignments).
• Strong knowledge on design principles, user experience, visual accessibility, and design thinking. Is able to use these skills to generate visual concepts and propose innovative solutions.
• Ability to think and respond quickly and to multi-task and work efficiently with careful attention to detail.
• Accountable for end-to-end creative development and Quality on advertising campaigns.
• Creates original concepts and designs with guidance from Art Directors and Creative Directors.
• Responsible of being a subject matter expert on impactful areas for the business, to provide and coordinate training, share updates with the team, and internal review.
• Leads medium-complexity project initiatives from end-to-end with limited guidance.
• Participates in global initiatives to improve creative standards and internal processes.
• Address the strategy and client needs, as defined in the creative brief, through creative ideation and campaign development.
• Provides and manages design documentation and specifications such as style guides and training material.
• Ensures design accuracy, adherence to brand tone and guidelines, Amazon templates and style guides on all deliverables.
• Implements Insights to increase performance and effectiveness of ads.
• Collaborates across disciplines with team members at all levels.
• Proactively build partnerships with internal Amazon teams.
• Provides mentoring to junior designers.
• Mitigates immediate risks. Decides if they can handle or need to escalate.

jobs.description:
Are you interested in building high-performance, globally scalable Financial systems that support Amazon's current and future growth? Are you seeking an environment where you can drive innovation? Does the prospect of working with top engineering talent get you charged up? If so, Amazon Finance Technology (FinTech) is for you.We have a team culture that encourages innovation and we expect developers to take a high level of ownership for the product vision, technical architecture,build a scalable,service-oriented platform and continuously innovate on behalf of our customers.

FinTech systems process large scale data sets eliminating several thousand hours of manual work for global Accounting and Finance teams. Our systems leverage the latest technologies from the AWS stack providing engineers an amazing opportunity to learn and grow.

We are looking for a Hyperion Financial management(HFM) Solution Architect who has expertise in end to end solution design,build and support Financial Consolidation process using HFM.The Engineer will work across Amazon engineering and business teams and seek opportunities to simplify Consolidation process providing enhanced user experience for our customers located across the globe.

Key job responsibilities
Must have experience with HFM application development and maintenance including understanding Accounting requirements and writing complex Business Rules to accommodate Consolidation requirements for USGAAP ,IFRS and Local statutory GAAP spread across multiple geographies.
Must have experience in understanding and troubleshooting Essbase Accounting cubes(Both BSO and ASO)
Must have experience in understanding DRM Chart of Account hierarchies and how it integrates with HFM and Essbase and its impact to overall Consolidation process.
Must have experience with Integrations tools - ODI/FDMEE, Scripting and PL/SQL.
